keyword: how many calories in ham cheese sandwich
title: How Many Calories in a Ham Cheese Sandwich?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in ham cheese sandwich, with full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Ham Cheese Sandwich?
assumptions: 2 slices white bread, 2 oz sliced deli ham, 1 oz cheddar cheese, 1 tsp mustard; assembled cold, no added mayo or veggies.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, ham/cheese brands, portion sizes, and additions like mayo or veggies. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard ham and cheese sandwich contains about 350 kcal, with 20 g protein and high sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a ham cheese sandwich with mayo?
faqs.a: Adding 1 tbsp mayo increases it to about 440 kcal.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a ham cheese sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 20 g protein from the ham and cheese.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in ham cheese sandwiches?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1000 mg due to processed ham and cheese.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in a ham cheese sandwich?
faqs.a: Opt for low-fat cheese, turkey ham, or whole grain bread to reduce by 50-100 kcal.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in a ham cheese sandwich?
faqs.a: About 30 g carbs, mostly from the bread; choose low-carb bread to cut this.
